entry.title: New release for DumbAssets: Introducing DumbAssets - The Stupid Simple Asset Manager!
entry.content:
Demo

Are you behind on managing all of your favorite assets?

Do you have too much junk in your trunk and need a way to organize all the paperwork and information that goes along with it?

Well, DumbAssets is here to stop you from feeling like a bum!

| Feature | Description | |---|---| | Hierarchical Asset Management | Place components under parents, and children under children. | | Warranty Expiration Notifications | Get alerts via Apprise for upcoming warranty expirations. | | Scheduled Maintenance Notifications | DumbAssets remembers to remind you about routine tasks like changing air filters or adding salt to your water softener. | | Asset Add/Edit/Delete Notifications | Receive customizable notifications whenever an asset is modified. | | Photo/Receipt/Manual Storage | Store photos of items, receipts, and manuals digitally for easy access. | | Tags | Organize assets with customizable tags. | | Sorting/Filtering | Sort and filter assets by warranty expirations/status, components, tags, search input, and alphabetical/expiration date. |

The goal of DumbAss...ets is to allow you the ability to manage all of your assets and related tasks in one app. Organizing each asset into it's proper place!

Hierarchical Management: The thing I'm most excited about is our ability to add components and sub-components to items, allowing you to organize things like:

Server Rack - Dell R730 - Toshiba 4TB HDD - XEON 2580 - Zyxel GS1900 - Ubiquiti Router

With product/warranty/maintenance info specified for each item!

DumbAssets is available on Dockerhub

Give the DumbAssets github repository a star and follow DumbWareio on Github for more updates and apps like this! We also appreciate coffee ðŸ˜€

As part of the DumbWare.io family, we're continuing our mission of developing stupid simple apps "that just work". Join our Discord community to share your dumb problems and pitch amazing dumb ideas!

Stay dumb, friends!
